sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"可行的"之意。
means: feasible ： 指完全可行，切实可行，强调成功的较大可能性。
possible ： 多用来消除对某事的怀疑，侧重从客观上看有存在或发生的可能。
practicable ： 强调经过证明是有效的，合乎实际，行得通的。

sentence.Network_en: Teachers can only be expected to do what is reasonable and practicable.
sentence.Network_cn: 教师只应该做合情合理而且切实可行的事。

sentence.Network_en: Please weigh the above points and see if they are practicable.
sentence.Network_cn: 以上几点意见是否可行,请酌定.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语：形容人的形容词_百度知道 ... noted 著名的（指人） practicable 可行的， 通行的 regrettable 遗憾的 （指事）.
可的五笔... ... 可信〖 believable;creditable〗 可行〖 feasible;practicable;workable〗 可行性〖 feasibility;feasibleness〗.
模具机械专用词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... pour 灌,注 practicable 行得通的 preferable 更好的,更可取的.
雅思词汇词根+联想... ... poverty n. 贫困,贫穷 practicable a. 可实行的,能用的,可行的 practical a. 实行的;注重实际的,实用的.

list.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... popular 受欢迎的 practical 实际的 precise 一丝不苟的.
在每一情况中，那些传布民族主义计划者似乎要比那些转向阶级政治者来得更不“乌托邦”、且更为“实用”（practical）。毕竟，民族主义者顺循着随着资本主义到来而宰制世界的国族性意识形态。
新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... multiplication n. 乘法运算 practically ad. 几乎， 将近 sacrifice v. 牺牲.
与一种实践(practice).资格意指个人与国家之间的正式关系,亦即授与个人的公民和政治权利,如投票权,言论自由等;实践则包括政治生活 …
七年级英语单词表 ... do some reading 读;阅读 practice 练习;实践 irregular 不规则的;无规律的.
法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 创造性 creativity 实用性 practicability 发明创造 invention and creation.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French praticable, from pratiquer 'put into practice'

entry.tran: （任务、计划或想法）切实可行的，行得通的
entry.def: If a task, plan, or idea is practicable, people are able to carry it out.

example.ex: It is not reasonably practicable to offer her the original job back...
example.tran: 让她继续做原来的工作在情理上行不通。

example.ex: Teachers can only be expected to do what is reasonable and practicable.
example.tran: 教师只应该做合情合理而且切实可行的事。

means.word_mean: 2. capable of being done with means at hand and circumstances as they are

auth_sentence.content: The remedy provided in Scotland is both practicable and fair, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remedy provided in Scotland is both practicable and fair, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remedy provided in Scotland is both practicable and fair, she said.

auth_sentence.content: We will endeavor to comply with your request as soon as reasonably practicable.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will endeavor to comply with your request as soon as reasonably practicable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will endeavor to comply with your request as soon as reasonably practicable.

auth_sentence.content: Nor am I so unfurnished...Of practicable schemes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor am I so unfurnished...Of practicable schemes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor am I so unfurnished...Of practicable schemes.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能实行的, 行得通的, 可以实行的
stems_affixes.word_buile: practice[v.实行]+able可以……的→adj.能实行的, 行得通的, 可以实行的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际的, 实践的, 实用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: pract实践,实际,应用+ical……的→adj.实际的, 实践的, 实用的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上, 事实上, 在实践上;几乎, 简直
stems_affixes.word_buile: practical[adj.实际的, 实践的, 实用的]+ly表副词→adv.实际上, 事实上, 在实践上;几乎, 简直
pract实践,实际,应用+ise表动词→[美]v.实行;实践

sentences.en: We hold a sure card to be practicable.
sentences.cn: 我们认为万全之策是切实可行的。

jushi.english: The only practicable alternative is to postpone the meeting.
jushi.chinese: 另外唯一可行的办法就是推迟会期。

jushi.english: We hold a sure card to be practicable.
jushi.chinese: 我们认为万全之策是切实可行的。
